bug.short_desc: Width and height do not restrict tooltip's contents in Firefox, Opera and Safari if text is long

long_desc.thetext:
In fact the minWidth do not operate well when a overflow other than visible is configured. This bug was introduced with Firefox 1.5 and is still buggy in Firefox 2.0.
As 0.8 will be box-model independent, this issue will be fixed with 0.8. Until then simply set overflow yourself as needed.
Closed all bugs already shipped with a release.
